name: Maulana Ishaq Cakraningrat - Electronic Engineering Students
description: I am an enthusiastic and motivated Computer Engineering student at State Polytechnic of Semarang, majoring in Electronic Engineering. With a strong interest in technology and innovation, I am passionate about exploring various aspects of computer systems, electronics, and programming. I enjoy learning new skills, solving technical problems, and applying theoretical knowledge to real-world situations through hands-on projects and teamwork. I am eager to grow both personally and professionally by taking part in opportunities that allow me to contribute, collaborate, and continue learning. My goal is to become a competent and creative engineer who can make a meaningful impact in the field of technology.
